review: Big hotel near peace if the waterfront, in a very bustling city. very colonial feel, nice pool area and bar. Upper floor rooms were clean and well equipped and have great views if you are on the side of the entrance. A lot of building...work on the other side of the hotel, although no noise was noted. Good food options for dinner and breakfast and attentive friendly sta work on the other side of the hotel, although no noise was noted. Good food options for dinner and breakfast and attentive friendly staff.

Where do I start?….. what an absolute amazing, friendly, hospitable greeting and from there it only got better. Amazing choice of world foods. Every genre you can think of is included. The bubbles were amazing and unlimited. Don’t even get me started on the deserts!!...I ate way too many because they were irresistible. I noticed my favourite dessert was not there ( creme brûlée) and after chatting to Kingsley, the executive pastry chef, two fabulous passion fruit creme brûlées appeared at our table like magic!! What service!
I loved the fact that the chefs walk around the tables talking to the guests. A big shout out to Manoj the sous chef and Madara the talented female trainee chef ( u go girl!) Also can’t forget the playful funny serving staff that consisted of Chaminda, Kanchana, Damian and Sunil. See you all soon as we will definitely be bac I ate way too many because they were irresistible. I came with my family and my best friend to celebrate my mamas birthday(for dinner) the experience was awesome had a great welcome everyone was really friendly and food was awesome. My personal favourite was the japanese cuisine. Would definetly recommend!!!

I had my husband's birthday on 22nd
Jan 2024. I must  say that I was highly satisfied  with the services  provided  by the hotel. My coordinator  was Dilanka Warnajith. The atmosphere  was great. Food was excellent  and had a fabulous spread  at the buffet.
All...my relatives  and the nephew  and the family  who had come from Australia  said that the food and services were excellent. 
My special  thanks go out to Dilanka, who attended  to all my requests  from the start to the end. From the table to the birthday  cake he attended  to all according  to my expectations.  He gave us perfect  service  so we will visit your restaurant  again. At the same time I can recommend  any one who wants to have a function  at this restaurant  is excellent  location because  of the friendly  atmosphere and the yummy  food. Finally he surprised  me with a special Pavlova pudding.  Many thanks to Dilanka for making  my husband's  birthday  party extraordina my relatives  and the nephew  and the family  who had come from Australia  said that the food and services were excellent.

I am a very regular guest of the Kingsbury hotel and have dinners at all the restaurants there. My favorite place is the Harbour  Court. I really like the ambience and the food display arrangements. Both managers Francis and Dilanka are providing a great service...and are very attentive to all the guests. Dilanka is especially excellent and goes beyond limits and serve customers in very personnel way. He knows the requirements of customers and always try his best to fulfill those requirements. This is one of the reason I go there frequently with my friends and family. 

I should also mention the skills of chef Sashi. He is an asset to this restaurant. I always tell him and the managers there he is best chef in Colombo. He too identifies the requirements of customers and do his best to provide an excellent service. Usually before I book a table for dinner I check whether Chef Sashi is available. 

Harbour court dinner buffet is the best buffet in Colom and are very attentive to all the guests. Dilanka is especially excellent and goes beyond limits and serve customers in very personnel way. Had a family lunch at Harbour court and food was exceptional and delicious also the staff who works in here are friendly special thanks to the chef Madara and waiter jayasiri.

Thinking about coming again with my friends for the Sunday brunch 

Best brunch in...t town
The food was good and  excellent efficient service. The staff and managers were wonderful. The only hotel where our needs a were attended to immediately. I would definitely recommend this place.

Mangala and sasikumar.
Food is brilliant and superb.  Services were brilliant and they are were friendly with their guest as well. By comparing to other hotels in colombo.I would like to recommend the hotel Kingsbury colombo.

I had lunch out with my office friend at The Kingsbury.  They provid us Best customer service.  Tasty foods.❤️ Manager Mangala  & his team give us good service Friedly staff service...   Highly recommended.  Supper amazing place. Value of money. 

Thank you Kingsbury.
Great cocktail suggestions from Hashan Wijesinghe, personable, friendly and informative. Highly recommend the Lagerita!
We came at the harbourt court  for lunch today .restaurant is very nice.excellent food.better experience..staff is very friendly with us .we got good service form chamodi and Nirasha

I wanted to express my heartfelt appreciation for the outstanding dining experience at Harbour Court  today . The top-notch food, wide selection, and impeccable service truly made this afternoon memorable. The personalized and courteous approach by the Managers Ruwan Kumar and Sumeda  was outstanding along...with the delightful entertainment, added an extra layer of satisfaction . Thank you for creating such a wonderful atmosphere. Keep up the good work a long awaited great experience that I will surely return for more!

They have a wide variety of food and the staff is really friendly. Highly recommend for celebrating you special occasions.
We were come for the breakfast today it was amazing we were enjoyed it . Specially Sri Lankan corner it was my favorite .thank you Rashmi and Rossini for your service
Amazing food. We had mezze platter which was Really delicious. The bread was soft and wonderful, hummus fantastic.,Best falafel I’ve eaten. Very good service and good value. Recommend 100%.
as someone who lived in oman for 12 years, this is the best arabic restaurant in sl !!! the food was so good and the service were so kind to us 🩷🩷
Amazing food and amazing service. A special shout out to Mushari and the manager for being so nice and helpful. The food and the portions were perfect.
This place is amazing with friendly stuff. Food was really delishes and tasty. The size of porcion  was also great. We love to come back.
Great food! Great way to eat some different cuisine while in Sri Lanka. We absolutely loved it! 10/10
This place has an amazing service and your food ordering time doesn’t even take that long and the food tastes amazing
Great as always. If you like Middle Eastern cuisine, you'll love it here. Nice atmosphere, professional waiters, delicious food. What else do you need?
Incredible food and good service, portions are perfect size and great value for money, I had the a kebab dish which was so good
Excellent food and service! Mushari was very helpful with his recommendations and knowledge of the menu. Will definitely be back!
Great middle Eastern food! Would definitely come back! The grilled meats and moussaka were very good.

Came with a friend on an impulse and loved the food, and the service was excellent too. Service was polite and quick, and. Food and drinks arrived at the table quickly. Came for a second time during the same week with my father, since the...first visit was so nice. Both times the food was fabulous. Tried the dips platter, areyas, coucous and kebabs and the amazing deserts during the two visits. All were flavourful and perfect portion sizes t first visit was so nice. Our dining experience at the Galle branch was excellent, prompting us to visit their Colombo location. However, our second visit took an unfortunate turn when we ordered the same dish, which turned out to be inedibly spicy. Upon informing the server, he initially dismissed our...concerns with an apology, attributing the issue to a sudden surge in business. As we were presented with the bill, we felt it was unjust to be charged for the unsatisfactory dish. At this stage the server eventually offered to replace it, but the timing was inconvenient as we were already tired and totally disappointed, prompting us to forego the replacement and head back to re concerns with an apology, attributing the issue to a sudden surge in business. Absolutely delicious food and wonderful service from Mushari! The mezzes were great for sharing and very flavourful. Would recommend:)
Excellent Middle Eastern food at a reasonable price point.  Provide Service with a smile and very accommodating.  Can improve their garlic Mayo dressing to a yoghurt mint based one though.
Amazing food and authentic menu. We had a wonderful experience and we will certainly be visiting again
